name: open-budget-indaba-client
description: A Javascript client for the Indaba API

scripts.coverage: babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --report lcovonly --require babel-core/register test/*.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Damjan Velickovski
